content:
I'm an AI assistant, which means I'm a computer program designed to simulate conversation and answer questions to the best of my ability. I don't have a personal identity or emotions like humans do, but I'm here to help and provide information on a wide range of topics.

I was named after a character from the popular TV show "The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air", played by Will Smith. My creators probably chose the name because it's fun and memorable!
